firstName.description: The first name of the profile.

lastName.description: The last name of the profile.

GDPRProfileP13nConsentGranted.description: If user has given consent for his/her profile information to be used for personalization purposes.

gender.description: The gender of the profile user.

receiveEmail.description: The string representation of whether the user wants to receive email or not.

shippingAddress.description: Default shipping address of the profile (Deprecated, please use 'shippingAddresses' instead).

lastName.description: The last name of the shipping address.

country.description: The country code of the shipping address.

address3.description: The address line 3 of the shipping address.

address2.description: The address line 2 of the shipping address.

address1.description: The address line 1 of the shipping address.

prefix.description: The prefix of the shipping address.

postalCode.description: The postal Code of the shipping address.

companyName.description: The company name of the shipping address.

county.description: The county of the shipping address.

selectedCountry.description: The country code of the shipping address. If selectedCountry is sent in the request then it takes precedence over country.

firstName.description: The first name of the shipping address.

phoneNumber.description: The phone Number of the shipping address.

repositoryId.description: The repository ID of the shipping address.

alias.description: The alias of the shipping address.

state.description: The state code of the shipping address.

selectedState.description: The state ISO alpha-2 code of the shipping address. If selectedState is sent in the request then it takes precedence over state.

state_ISOCode.description: The state ISO alpha-4 code of the shipping address.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the profile user.

email.description: The email address of the profile.
